uniques.name: Calamity

tooltipDescriptions.description: [100,150,0]% Chance to Ignite on Hit with Fire Skills
When you kill an enemy with a fire skill you take 4 fire damage over the next 2 seconds

uniques.loreText: Set the world ablaze and burn along with it.

uniques.name: Fractured Crown

tooltipDescriptions.description: You have no ward

uniques.loreText: Few goals have cost more lives than the quest for power.

uniques.name: Snowblind

tooltipDescriptions.description: 40% chance to chill on hit with cold skills
40% chance to blind on hit with cold skills
You are immune to Blind and Chill

uniques.loreText: Blind with the snow, never blinded by it.

uniques.name: Artor Legacy
uniques.loreText: The great wolf Artor ran with Heorot in times long forgotten.

uniques.name: Decayed Skull

tooltipDescriptions.description: 80% increased void and necrotic damage
20% of void and necrotic damage taken as physical damage
[3,10,1]% More Armor (multiplicative with other modifiers)

uniques.loreText: A monument to the world's decay carved in bone and steel.

uniques.name: IsadoraRevenge

tooltipDescriptions.description: [36,48,2]% Increased Duration of Chill Applied by Necrotic Spells

uniques.loreText: "...and enraged she arose with murder in her eyes..."

uniques.name: Boneclamor Barbute
uniques.loreText: "The essence of the bone seemed to reverberate within my skull. Singing and dancing into a song of fortifying vigor. Never have I felt so alive."- Ethenus, First Legate of the Immortal Legion.

uniques.name: The Kestrel
uniques.loreText: May the dying breaths of your enemies put air beneath your wings.

uniques.name: Doublet of Onos Tull

tooltipDescriptions.description: Minions have +[60,100,2]% Chance to Inflict Bleed on Hit
Minions have [60,100,1]% Increased Bleed Duration

uniques.loreText: The horns of the Immortal Empire fill the hearts of the living with fear, and the bones of the dead with glory.

uniques.name: Prism Wraps
uniques.loreText: The elements shift like light through a prism. If you control the prism you control the elements.

uniques.name: Urzils Pride

tooltipDescriptions.description: 1% increased mana regeneration per 2% uncapped Lightning Resistance

uniques.loreText: Strength of mind and strength of body are a potent combination.

uniques.name: Exsanguinous

tooltipDescriptions.description: [15,30,0]% increased attack speed, cast speed, and movement speed if you have used a potion in the past 4 seconds
Immunity to Bleed at low health
tooltipDescriptions.altText: You are on low health while below 35% of your maximum health

uniques.loreText: Crazed is the mind of a blood starved Lich.

uniques.name: Preparation

tooltipDescriptions.description: +30 melee cold damage when above 65% health
3% of melee damage leeched as health when below 65% health

uniques.loreText: Yrun was wise in battle, but not in his betrayal of Heorot.

uniques.name: Titan Heart

tooltipDescriptions.description: You do not regenerate health
tooltipDescriptions.altText: You can still regain health through methods other than health regen

uniques.loreText: Heart of stone, blood of gravel.

uniques.name: Valeroot
uniques.loreText: The roots of Eterra grow through stone and flesh and time.

uniques.name: Vipertail
uniques.loreText: The bite of the viper brings lethargy and death.

uniques.name: IsadoraTombbinding
uniques.loreText: "...with a stake they slew her, and with silver they bound her..."

uniques.name: Ward Trail
uniques.loreText: Many things are fickle, few more so than life itself.

uniques.name: Chains of Uleros

tooltipDescriptions.description: 24% reduced duration of stuns on you
Your potions grant ward instead of health
tooltipDescriptions.altText: 100% of the health you would gain on potion use is gained as ward instead

uniques.loreText: Tether yourself to this mortal realm.

uniques.name: Mourningfrost

tooltipDescriptions.description: +1 cold damage to attacks and spells per point of dexterity
-1% physical and cold resistance per point of dexterity

uniques.loreText: Spread ice with every step, like frost before sunrise.

uniques.name: Stormtide

tooltipDescriptions.description: You are shocked for 4 seconds when you stop moving
tooltipDescriptions.altText:
Does not shock you if you are already shocked
Your shock effectiveness does not apply to this shock

uniques.loreText: Rest was a sin among the messenger priests of Lagon, and these boots would punish the wearer accordingly.

uniques.name: Eterras Path

tooltipDescriptions.description: You and your minions have 20% increased movement speed
You and your minions have [20,28,1]% increased healing effectiveness
Every second if you are moving you have a [20,28,2]% chance to cast Summon Vines
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Summon Vines is an active skill in Spriggan Form and scales with specific nodes on its tree. Limited to 12 Vines by default.

uniques.loreText: Life grows in your footsteps.

tooltipDescriptions.description: 10% chance to summon a swarm of bees on melee hit (8 second cooldown)

uniques.name: Riverbend Grasp
uniques.loreText: Move with the fluidity of water, relax and you can react without resistance.

uniques.name: Fighting Chance
uniques.loreText: Fight for your life.

uniques.name: Boulderfists

tooltipDescriptions.description: You cannot leech health

uniques.loreText: Strike with the force of a mountain.

uniques.name: IsadoraGravechill

tooltipDescriptions.description: +100% chance to chill with necrotic abilities if you have killed an enemy in the last 5 seconds

uniques.loreText: "...yet her strength was not blood, but of bone..."

uniques.name: Wing Guards

tooltipDescriptions.description: You cannot deal critical strikes

uniques.loreText: Speed is its own accuracy.

uniques.name: Beast King

tooltipDescriptions.description: 8% less damage taken if your minions have killed recently
tooltipDescriptions.altText:
Recently refers to the past 4 seconds.
Multiplicative with other modifiers.

tooltipDescriptions.description: minions take 25% less damage if you have killed recently
tooltipDescriptions.altText:
Recently refers to the past 4 seconds.
Multiplicative with other modifiers.

uniques.loreText: The King of Beasts leads the charge.

uniques.name: Taste of Blood

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you hit a bleeding enemy with a melee attack all bleed stacks on that enemy double in speed
tooltipDescriptions.altText: When a bleed stack's speed is double its duration is halved and its damage per second is doubled.

uniques.loreText: A bloody fervor clouds the mind.

tooltipDescriptions.description: 5% increased physical damage for each recent melee hit against a bleeding enemy (up to 255%)
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Recent refers to the past 4 seconds

uniques.name: Tempest Maw

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[3,6,3] Strength and Attunement
When you summon a totem you also summon 4 Storm Sprites around the totem (6 second cooldown)

uniques.loreText: A last sign of favour bestowed to those doomed to fight for Lagon's amusement in his sunken arena.

uniques.name: Frozen Ire

tooltipDescriptions.description: +1 spell cold damage per 5 character levels ([1,c,5])
+2% freeze rate multiplier per character level ([2,c]%)
+1% necrotic resistance per character level ([1,c])
15% chance to cast tundra nova on hit with cold skills (chance doubled against undead)

uniques.loreText: An alliance of wengari and nomads gathered in the northern tundra, forging weapons of ice and preparing to reclaim Heoborea from the Immortal Empire.

uniques.name: Culnivars Claim

tooltipDescriptions.description: 100% of mana converted to ward when you reach full mana
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Does not trigger while your mana is replaced with Rage

uniques.loreText: Culnivar, last scion of Liath, was a symbol of hope for the living slaves of Thetima.

uniques.name: Humming Bee

tooltipDescriptions.description: Elemental Attacks deal 1% Increased Damage per 200 Ward
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This effects all damage from the attack, including damage from ailments and non-elemental damage.

uniques.loreText: Bzzzzzzzzzz

uniques.name: Eye of Reen

tooltipDescriptions.description: Each stack of Reen's Ire grants 5% melee critical strike multiplier and 10% increased fire damage over time

uniques.loreText: Dance through the flames.

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[25,75,1]% chance to Shock Ignite and Chill on Hit

uniques.name: Cinder Song

tooltipDescriptions.description: [15,25,0]% chance to inflict Spreading Flames on Hit
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Spreading flames deals fire damage over time and spreads between enemies. It does not stack.

tooltipDescriptions.description: -3 Mana Cost for Fire Spells

uniques.loreText: An ode to fires past.

uniques.name: Alchemists Ladle

tooltipDescriptions.description: [20,45,0]% chance to ignite, chill, shock, bleed, slow, poison, and blind on melee hit

uniques.loreText: Infused with countless potions, its effects are unpredictable.

uniques.name: Reach of the Grave

tooltipDescriptions.description: Your minions' spells and bow attacks deal [70,120,0]% increased damage
Your minions leech 10% of damage dealt by their spells and bow attacks as health

uniques.loreText: The touch of death reaches far beyond the grave.

uniques.name: Bone Harvester

tooltipDescriptions.description: 20% chance to summon a Skeleton Harvester for 15 seconds on kill

uniques.loreText: Some kill without a purpose. Acolytes kill for the harvest.

uniques.name: Hammer Of Lorent

tooltipDescriptions.description: +1 melee physical damage per level ([1,c])
1% increased melee stun chance per level ([1,c]%)

uniques.loreText: Lorent may be gone, but its memory will remain with you as you grow.

uniques.name: Torch Of The Pontifex

tooltipDescriptions.description: You cremate enemies you kill, burning enemies around them
You have a 10% chance to summon a Burning Skeleton for 10 seconds when you cremate an enemy

uniques.loreText: Pontifex Yulia, High Priest of the Immortal Empire, would sacrifice entire villages and raise burning soldiers from the ashes.

uniques.name: Stormbreaker

tooltipDescriptions.description: Gain a Storm Stack when you directly use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Storm Stacks are expended every second to cast Storm Bolt at a nearby enemy. This interval is reduced by 2% for every stack you currently have.

uniques.loreText: Strike with the power of the storm.

uniques.name: Draalsting
uniques.loreText: Poison the mind, kill the heart.

uniques.name: Morditas Reach

tooltipDescriptions.description: +500% chance to inflict Frostbite on Melee Hit
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Frostbite deals cold damage over time and reduces freeze avoidance, increasing the enemy's chance to be frozen.

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[20,30,0] Melee Cold Damage for you and your minions

uniques.loreText: Boundless ambition enshrined in ice.

tooltipDescriptions.description: 35% increased damage to bleeding targets
5% chance to cause you to bleed when you hit with your weapon

uniques.name: The Last Laugh

tooltipDescriptions.description: Instantly kill enemies that are left below [15,20,1]% Health by a Melee Attack
tooltipDescriptions.altText: If you have a similar effect from an item or node then the highest threshold is used

tooltipDescriptions.description: +5% melee critical strike chance if you have less than 100 dodge rating

uniques.loreText: When the headsman's blade falls, Sarno laughs in triumph.

uniques.name: Volcanus

tooltipDescriptions.description: 15% chance to cast Magma Shards on melee hit

uniques.loreText: Crafted in the Divine Era in the great forges beneath the mountains of Rahyeh.

uniques.name: Dreamthorn
uniques.loreText: Eater of dreams, weaver of nightmares.

uniques.name: The Monolith

tooltipDescriptions.description: 100% less damage taken on block

uniques.loreText: Some slabs mark the dead, this one marks the living.

uniques.name: Close Call

tooltipDescriptions.description: 40% increased dodge rating for each hit you have blocked recently
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Recently refers to the last 4 seconds

uniques.loreText: Light on your feet, with a foot in the grave.

uniques.name: Soul Bastion

tooltipDescriptions.description: Gains a Soul Charge on kill
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Soul charges last for 10 seconds

tooltipDescriptions.description: At 5 soul charges, casts Soul Eruption

uniques.loreText: The weight of souls is too much for most.

uniques.name: Rahyehs Light
uniques.loreText: Burn with the fire of the eternal sun.

uniques.name: Strong Mind

tooltipDescriptions.description: 200% of maximum mana added as stun avoidance
Cast a small lightning explosion when you are stunned

uniques.loreText: Stand Fast.

uniques.name: Bleeding Heart

tooltipDescriptions.description: You are inflicted with bleed when you cast a spell

uniques.loreText: Drink the blood of the weak.

uniques.name: Chimaeras Essence
uniques.loreText: Shifting, Changing, Striking.

uniques.name: ElementalistFrozenHeart
uniques.loreText: ...alone with ice in his heart, he gained mastery of his art...

uniques.name: The Claw

tooltipDescriptions.description: You can Summon Wolves up to your Maximum Number of Companions
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Affects the Summon Wolf skill. Does not increase your maximum number of companions.

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[5,9,1] Melee Physical Damage for Minions

uniques.loreText: A wolf never hunts alone.

uniques.name: Death Rattle

tooltipDescriptions.description: Your minions take [10,30,0]% increased damage
Regain 30 health on minion death

uniques.loreText: The rattle of the dying is the sound of weakness leaving the world.

uniques.name: The Fang

tooltipDescriptions.description: You can Summon Wolves up to your Maximum Number of Companions
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Affects the Summon Wolf skill. Does not increase your maximum number of companions.

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[10,16,1] Melee Physical Damage for Minions
Your minions cannot be stunned

uniques.loreText: A wolf never hunts alone.

uniques.name: Orians Eye

tooltipDescriptions.description: [75,150,1]% increased duration of stun immunity after being stunned

uniques.loreText: The future burns within the prophetic lense.

uniques.name: Ring of the Third Eye

tooltipDescriptions.description: 30% Chance to gain [15,18,0] Ward on Crit (up to 4 times per second)

uniques.loreText: Forsee the strikes, imbue them with power.

uniques.name: ElementalistScorchingGrasp
uniques.loreText: ...his master fell, a firey death knell...

uniques.name: ElementalistStaticTouch
uniques.loreText: ...electrified with ambition, he cast spells beyond his cognition...

uniques.name: Arboreal Circuit

tooltipDescriptions.description: 10% chance to summon an illusory tree when hit (15 second cooldown)
[5,10,1]% increased Movement Speed for you and your minions

uniques.loreText: You can search round and round, but you are seeking an illusion.

uniques.name: Hollow Finger

tooltipDescriptions.description: +1 Maximum Skeleton
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Affects the Acolyte's Summon Skeleton skill

uniques.loreText: Only brittle skin remains.

uniques.name: Tome of Elements

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[15,45,0]% chance to chill, shock, and ignite on hit with elemental skills
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Elemental refers to fire, cold, and lightning

tooltipDescriptions.description: [10,15,1]% increased chill, shock, and ignite duration

uniques.loreText: The power of the elements is greatest in their most primal state.

uniques.name: Grimoire of Necrotic Elixirs

tooltipDescriptions.description: [30,40,0]% less void, necrotic, and poison damage taken for 4 seconds on potion use
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Multiplicative with other modifiers

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[30,40,2] necrotic damage to melee attacks and spells for 4 seconds on potion use

uniques.loreText: Take a quaff from draught of undeath.

uniques.name: Heirloom of Light

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you cast a spell while facing East you have a 20% chance to cast radiant nova
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Radiant nova is a fire spell. Its damage scales with your attunement.

tooltipDescriptions.description: You have 1% increased spell damage per level if you have cast radiant nova recently
tooltipDescriptions.altText: recently refers to the last 4 seconds

uniques.loreText: Wherever you go, the sun still rises in Solarum. Wherever you may be, Rahyeh is your judge.

uniques.name: Soulfire

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[100,160,1]% Chance to Ignite on Hit with Fire Skills and Necrotic Skills
60% increased fire damage if you have killed an enemy recently
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Recently refers to the last 4 seconds

tooltipDescriptions.description: 100% increased armor while ignited
Hungering Souls Ignite on Hit instead of Possessing

uniques.loreText: The souls of the damned burn with eternal fire.

uniques.name: Valdyr Chalice
uniques.loreText: The blood within is said to reflect the drinker's true face.

uniques.name: Orchirians Petals

tooltipDescriptions.description: 13% Increased Cast Speed with Physical Spells
21% Increased Critical Strike Chance with Physical Spells
34% Increased Stun Chance with Physical Spells

uniques.loreText: Petals harvested from the remains of Orchirian the Rampant, still bright with the light of an ancient sun.

uniques.name: Plague Bearer Staff

tooltipDescriptions.description: 100% Chance To Inflict Plague on Hit
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Plague deals poison over time and spreads to enemies around the target, but does not stack.

tooltipDescriptions.description: 20% Chance To Blind Attackers
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Blind causes enemies to aim erratically, reducing the chance that they will hit you, especially at range. Blind does not stack.

tooltipDescriptions.description: [10,20,0]% More Damage Over Time against Enemies afflicted with Plague
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Multiplicative with other modifiers

uniques.loreText: The Plague Bearer wandered far and wide searching for a cure for his affliction and left only death in his wake.

uniques.name: Ignivar Head

tooltipDescriptions.description: Cast Fire Aura every second while Channelling
Disintegrate deals more damage equal to your spell crit chance
tooltipDescriptions.altText: If you have 40% spell crit chance Disintegrate deals 40% more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers)

uniques.loreText: Dying cinders illuminate the empty skull.

uniques.name: The Scavenger

tooltipDescriptions.description: Gain Haste for 3 Seconds on Potion Use

uniques.loreText: Gods may fall and empires crumble, but the furtive scavenger lives on.

uniques.name: Liath Signet
uniques.loreText: For centuries Architect Liath ensured the prosperity of Lagon's realm.

uniques.name: Bloodgeon
uniques.loreText: Crush. Maul. Bludgeon.

uniques.name: Ucenui Sphere

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[20,40,1]% Cold and Lightning Resistance
3 Water Orbs per cast if your Attunement is Equal to your Intelligence
30% increased Cold and Lightning Damage for each Water Orb you have cast in the past 12 seconds
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Bonus Water Orbs also apply this buff

uniques.loreText: Ucenui the navigator used his water magic to explore the vast ocean beyond the Isle of Storms. His fate is unknown, but his instrument remains.

uniques.name: Arek Bones

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[60,90,1]% Chance to apply Armour Shred on Hit for You and Your Minions
[100, 200, 2]% Increased Armour Shred Effect for You and Your Minions

uniques.loreText: The necromancers were careful to keep Arek's mind intact while they extracted the bones from his flesh.

uniques.name: Maehlin Hubris
uniques.loreText: Maehlin devoted his life to Rahyeh. Seeking to learn his will he reached into the god's mind. Rahyeh reached back into his and set his blood aflame.

uniques.name: Heirloom of the Last Nomad

tooltipDescriptions.description: Using a Potion Cleanses Stun and Freeze

uniques.loreText: The last nomad wandered the northern wastes in the dying days of the Ruined Era, searching in vain for a living soul among the void and snow.

uniques.name: Blade of the Forgotten Knight

tooltipDescriptions.description: 15% increased Attack and Cast Speed

uniques.loreText: Incongruous shards of iron from distant eras woven together through time.

uniques.name: Defiance of the Forgotten Knight
uniques.loreText: Dread not the passage of time nor the eternal void beyond.

uniques.name: Locket of the Forgotten Knight

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[2,3,1]% Critical Strike Chance with Void Skills

uniques.loreText: A sanctuary for memories lost.

uniques.name: Fiery Dragon Shoes
uniques.loreText: Embers of a dragon's heart still linger in these smoldering scales. Dire hits threaten to stoke a wrath that has long slumbered.

uniques.name: Jungle Queen Chaps of Holding
uniques.loreText: The lack of a bottom means that there is more material for pockets.

uniques.name: Kermodes Cage

tooltipDescriptions.description: White Fur in Werebear Form

uniques.loreText: The fury of the spirit bear can not be restrained or subdued, even while confined.

uniques.name: The Last Bears Fury
uniques.loreText: The last bear stood alone against the void, guarding the cave in which she thought her cubs still rested.

uniques.name: The Last Bears Scorn
uniques.loreText: The last bear's bloodline survived wars between gods, and empires.

uniques.name: The Last Bears Lament
uniques.loreText: The last bear's ancestors watched as the Temple of Eterra fell from the sky.

uniques.name: Halvars Pledge
uniques.loreText: The shaman Halvar bound himself with the spirit of the mountain.

uniques.name: Halvars Stand
uniques.loreText: When Morditas’ army closed in on him, Halvar asked the mountain to bury them together.

uniques.name: Last Gift of the Mountain
uniques.loreText: The mountain was sad to lose a friend as true as Halvar.

uniques.name: Pebbles Femur

tooltipDescriptions.description: +3 Melee Lightning Damage for Minions

uniques.loreText: Feeding Pebbles was one of my favorite things to do. -Traveling Merchant

uniques.name: Pebbles Collar

tooltipDescriptions.description: +3 Melee Cold Damage for Minions

uniques.loreText: The bones in Pebbles' body respond to metal like a magnet. I’m beginning to think I’m in over my head. -Traveling Merchant

uniques.name: Pebbles Bitemarked Sash

tooltipDescriptions.description: +3 Melee Fire Damage for Minions

uniques.loreText: As I lay in the ditch pulling my entrails back into my body, I wonder; who is the pet now?-Traveling Merchant

uniques.name: Legacy of the Quiet Forest
uniques.loreText: “This branch will protect you, even when I can not.” - the last words Quiet heard from her forest friend.

uniques.name: Suloron Step
uniques.loreText: The rebel Suloron struck deep into Majasa's territory, but his fervour could not save him from the matrons' blades.

uniques.name: The Ashen Crown

tooltipDescriptions.description: Elemental Nova is now cast at the target location

uniques.loreText: The great crown of the regent of Wyvernfall, bestowed by Rahyeh, recovered from the ruins.

uniques.name: Shroud of Obscurity
uniques.loreText: Shrouded in a fetid swamp, disregarded by the gods' watchful eyes, the witches of Urix honed the art of blood magic.

uniques.name: Muramas Hilt
uniques.loreText: Xenath broke his father's sword, casting away the cursed blade in resentment of his harsh master, and keeping the hilt as a reminder of his loving parent.

uniques.name: Melvern Writ
uniques.loreText: "If Liath will not afford me guards I will purchase my own. Deliver this writ to Skalnir, along with the gold, and bring me back enough mercenaries to secure caravans to Vul'Kaur."- Trade Prince Melvern

uniques.name: Shard of the Shattered Lance
uniques.loreText: Dreams of deicide reflected in ice.

uniques.name: Fragments of the Shattered Lance
uniques.loreText: Crafted in desperation, seized with ambition.

uniques.name: Woven Flesh
uniques.loreText: The pinnacle of necromancy is to weave undead flesh into any form you desire.

uniques.name: Strands of Souls
uniques.loreText: It is unseemly to wear the heads of your foes upon your belt like a common witch or wengari, and what is the point if the eyes can no longer see and the brains can no longer think. No, a necromancer should wear the souls of those they have conquered, a repository of sentient energy ready to consume.

uniques.name: Ribbons of Blood

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[4,7,1] Melee Physical Damage for Minions
Your Minions cannot be Crit

uniques.loreText: The congealing liquid grips tight around your finger, the memories of its vessels passing into those that you summon.

uniques.name: Frozen Eyes of Formosus

tooltipDescriptions.description: [80,140,4]% increased Minion Cold Damage
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Increases cold damage dealt by all minions

uniques.loreText: The eyes still stare out, transfixed with longing for the power their owner sought.

uniques.name: Last Steps of the Living

tooltipDescriptions.description: You are Chilled every 3 seconds

uniques.loreText: Step out of the cold, out of the mortal realm, and take your place among the empire.

uniques.name: Atrophy

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[20,25,0]% Penetration against All Resistances for Damage Over Time

uniques.loreText: Rust and corrosion stand as monuments to the inevitability of time.

uniques.name: Dark Shroud of Cinders
uniques.loreText: The dying embers of a god swiling around a blackened cloak.

uniques.name: The Confluence of Fate
uniques.loreText: The fall of Eterra is inevitable, as it always has been.

uniques.name: Bulwark of the Last Abyss

tooltipDescriptions.description: Every 3 seconds if you are on high health you lose 25% of your current health and gain the Apocalypse buff for 3 seconds
tooltipDescriptions.altText: The only effects of the Apocalypse buff are the ones lists on this item.

tooltipDescriptions.description: 70% increased Void Damage during Apocalypse
+70% Melee Critical Strike Multiplier during Apocalypse

uniques.loreText: Hold steadfast at the edge of light.

uniques.name: Trident of the Last Abyss
uniques.loreText: The dark ocean of void lies still. Echoes are all that remain of the strife that preceeded it.

uniques.name: Coral Aegis
uniques.loreText: As storms scour the land, the sea swells and flourishes.

uniques.name: Alluvion
uniques.loreText: Waves woven into steel.

uniques.name: Symbol of Demise

tooltipDescriptions.description: Every 3 seconds your ward is consumed, granting a stack of Demise per 13 ward consumed
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Stacks of Demise last 3 seconds

tooltipDescriptions.description: Each stack of Demise grants 10% Bleed Chance (up to 200%)
Each stack of Demise grants 1% increased Bleed Duration

uniques.loreText: The fate of the world engraved in bone.

uniques.name: Dragonflame Edict
uniques.loreText: Go forth and conquer by force or by fire.

uniques.name: Oceareon
uniques.loreText: Empires rise and fall like the waves, but the ocean's might is eternal.

uniques.name: Mortality Grasp

tooltipDescriptions.description: [30,45,0]% chance to Mark for Death on Hit with Necrotic Spells
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Mark for Death is a curse that lasts 8 seconds and reduces all resistances by 25%. It cannot stack

uniques.loreText: "The living necromancers of the early empire were quick to take life and to return it. They knew more of the nature of life than any who had come before them, so it is curious that they clung to their own with such desperation. Were these founders of our empire fools and cowards, or did they know something then that we have now forgotten? I wonder if there is something that we have lost in these centuries of undeath."- Recanted texts of Historian Zabat

uniques.name: Boardman Plank

tooltipDescriptions.description: Your companions are Enraged when hit by your Storm Totem
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Enrage gives 60% increased attack and cast speed and 35% increased movement speed.

uniques.loreText: Unleash the Beast.

tooltipDescriptions.description: You are Frenzied for 3 seconds when hit by your Storm Totem
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Frenzy gives 20% increased attack and cast speed.

tooltipDescriptions.description: [10,21,1]% Increased Area of Storm Totem Aura
You gain haste for 3 seconds when hit by your Storm Totem
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Haste gives 30% increased attack and cast speed.

tooltipDescriptions.description: 21% increased minion attack and cast speed
[10,21,1]% Increased Area of Storm Totem Aura

uniques.name: Gambler Fallacy

tooltipDescriptions.description: Your Skills gain +100% Critical Strike Chance if you have not dealt a Critical Strike Recently. Excludes Channeled Skills.
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Recently refers to the last 4 seconds.

uniques.loreText: Just means you're due for a big one, don't worry.

uniques.name: Avarice
uniques.loreText: Have the wisdom to know what is rightfully yours and the will to seize it.

uniques.name: Transient Rest
uniques.loreText: We follow in the footsteps of our ancestors, but our paths no longer end.

uniques.name: Xithara Conundrum

tooltipDescriptions.description: You have no health regen
tooltipDescriptions.altText: You can still regain health through methods other than health regen

tooltipDescriptions.description: You have no health leech
tooltipDescriptions.altText: You can still regain health through methods other than health leech

uniques.loreText: Strong in times of peace, brilliant in the day, generous in times of plenty, and absent when they fade.

uniques.name: Liraka Claws
uniques.loreText: Scalebane recruits are taught to never travel south of Mes'Ork in groups of less than six. Information on Li'raka's whereabouts are valuable, so it is pertinent that one should escape alive.

uniques.name: Quicksilver Coil
uniques.loreText: War is about the destination, not the journey.

uniques.name: Smoke Weaver
uniques.loreText: A true assassin must create their own shadows to strike from.

uniques.name: Uethrin Stand

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[15, 25, 3] Bow Physical Damage for Minions

uniques.loreText: Uethrin made his last stand on the shores of Lake Mawn. By dawn all that remained was a pile of Wengari bodies and his line of ballistae standing still and victorious upon the shore. His home was safe for another winter.

uniques.name: Zerrick Guile

tooltipDescriptions.description: [15,20,3]% increased Melee and Throwing Attack Speed for 4 seconds when you use a Potion

uniques.loreText: Zerrick's humility and reverence for the Nagasa and the Scalebane leaders long kept him in their favour, sealing their demise.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Cannot Leech Health from Damage over Time

uniques.name: Zerrick Ambition
uniques.loreText: In games of power you win or you die

uniques.name: Hell Reach
uniques.loreText: As Wyvernfall burned nothing could escape the flames.

uniques.name: Drelkor Compass
uniques.loreText: "Enemies lie to the north, south, east, and west, but it matters not whence they come; Welryn must not fall."Drelkor, last Lord of the Lakes.

uniques.name: Gladiator Oath

tooltipDescriptions.description: Dancing Strikes' 3rd Strike Creates a Fighting Arena

uniques.loreText: There is no mercy among the sands of the arena. Majasa demands beauty, be it the glory of victory or the dance of blood.

uniques.name: Acidfletch
uniques.loreText: From the Radiant Dunes to the Sea of Glass, order corrodes throughout Eterra.

uniques.name: Life Journey
uniques.loreText: Hold fast to the wheel of life, cling tight as it withers your skin and grinds your flesh to dust.

uniques.name: Troaka Teeth

tooltipDescriptions.description: +90 Freeze Rate with Puncture

uniques.loreText: Many among the nomads had assumed Troaka slain along with her family, but in truth she still hunted out on the tundra and among the frozen lakes. Except she no longer hunted deer nor eber, only wengari.

uniques.name: Raindance
uniques.loreText: Those who seek Lagon's favour dance beneath the moon. Those who seek his adoration dance beneath the waves.

uniques.name: Arrowguard
uniques.loreText: "Look only west and trust that the sun itself leads our march. "- Pontixex Aurelus to the auxiliaries of Solarum

uniques.name: Omnividence
uniques.loreText: Gaze upon all that will never be.

uniques.name: Sunwreath

tooltipDescriptions.description: Flame Reave hits enemies in an expanding circle around you
tooltipDescriptions.altText: The circle has 35% less range than Flame Reave's normal shape

uniques.loreText: Yield not snow, nor seas, nor sand to the flames of the sun, for it will consume all and remain unsated.

uniques.name: Eulogy of Blood
uniques.loreText: Only the whispers of ghosts can be heard among the stillness of the crimson tundra.

uniques.name: Anchor of Oblivion

tooltipDescriptions.description: When a hit leaves you below your endurance threshold you are slowed and release a powerful Wave of Void (2 second cooldown)

uniques.loreText: Hope pulls you forward, but the anchor ever stays your feet, as is the fate of mortals.

uniques.name: Wings of Argentus
uniques.loreText: Falter not before the fire nor the ice, but let your ambition be your wings and soar above them both.

uniques.name: Eye of Storms

tooltipDescriptions.description: Cast Maelstrom every 3 seconds
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This consumes Maelstrom's mana cost

uniques.loreText: Torrential rain falls upon a dark and churning sea to the deafening sound of thunder and waves. The moon gleams from above and Lagon gazes from below as the centuries pass.

uniques.name: Horns of Uhkeiros
uniques.loreText: Uhkeriros, Emperor of Corpses, hear our prayers! Devour your chosen and free us from this undeath.

uniques.name: Gaspar Will
uniques.loreText: I failed to protect. I failed to lead. Destruction is all that is left.

uniques.name: Gaspar Acuity
uniques.loreText: Knowledge without power is nothing but informed futility.

uniques.name: Gaspar Insight
uniques.loreText: Among the ruins what is wisdom, but empty platitudes?

uniques.name: Reign of Winter
uniques.loreText: “For us to survive, others must suffer. One day you will accept this truth.” -Morditas, forsaken son of Heorot.

uniques.name: Call of the Tundra

tooltipDescriptions.description: Warcry is Converted to Cold
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Converts stun to freeze, physical damage to cold damage, and bleed to frostbite.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Warcry no longer knocks enemies back

uniques.loreText: Jormun slew the great wyverns of Farwood at Heorot's behest, freezing them with his shouts and shattering them with his blades.

uniques.name: Faith of the Frozen
uniques.loreText: Found among the frozen corpses in the wake of Morditas' wrath. Runes etched into the handle read "Heorot protect us".

uniques.name: Bhuldar Wrath

tooltipDescriptions.description: Earthquake is Converted To Fire
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Only converts base damage not added damage

tooltipDescriptions.description: 100% of Armour Shred Chance Converted to Ignite Chance for Earthquake

uniques.loreText: Shatter! Erupt! This world is only a prison for the immortal flame.

uniques.name: Herkir Vessel
uniques.loreText: Drink deep of the flame, brothers... Immortality awaits.

uniques.name: Logi Hunger
uniques.loreText: Rise! Through fire we are reborn.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Minions deal 90% less Poison Damage
tooltipDescriptions.altText: multiplicative with other modifiers

uniques.name: Moenia Mentis
uniques.loreText: "To survive the void we must build unassailable walls, not just around this town, but around our minds. Do not approach the cultists, do not speak to them."- Eos Falrein, last Archmage of Vul'Kaur.

uniques.name: Raven Rise

tooltipDescriptions.description: Minions take [20,28,1]% less Damage While Moving

uniques.loreText: As men and gods fight the ravens rise. As the blood settles the ravens alight.

uniques.name: Flight of the First

tooltipDescriptions.description: Moving after Attacking grants you Ancient Flight for 2 seconds
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Cannot be triggered by movement skills

tooltipDescriptions.description: +2 Arrows with Flurry and Multishot while you have Ancient Flight
100% increased Critical Strike Chance while you have Ancient Flight
+100% Critical Strike Avoidance while you have Ancient Flight

uniques.loreText: Those who ventured outside in the Ancient Era lived in constant terror

uniques.name: Aergon Refuge
uniques.loreText: "Hold fast, maintain the runes! The flames of Rahyeh may envelope this tower, but they shall not penetrate these walls. There is knowledge here that must not burn."

uniques.name: Unique Skeleton Mace

tooltipDescriptions.description: +30 to 33% to All Resistances for Minions

uniques.loreText: As the last dagger plunged into Sinathia's body he uttered a dying curse, sealing the fate of his assassins.

uniques.name: Unique Skeleton Shield
uniques.loreText: As the last of his assassins succumbed to their fates, Sinathia stirred within his tomb.

uniques.name: Herald of the Scurry

tooltipDescriptions.description: Converts your Wolves into Squirrels
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Squirrels deal 35% less damage than wolves

tooltipDescriptions.description: Howl is replaced by Sciurine Rage, which grants Squirrels 40% increased movement speed and melee attack speed for 4 seconds.
You can Summon Squirrels up to twice your Companion Limit

uniques.loreText:
One squirrel, two squirrel, cute and furry
Three squirrel, four squirrel, what's the hurry?
Five squirrel, six squirrel, you should worry
Run and hide, here comes the scurry!

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[55,75,0]% Chance to Poison on Hit with Fire Skills
Gain Ruby Venom for 10 seconds on Block
tooltipDescriptions.altText: You can have multiple stacks of Ruby Venom

tooltipDescriptions.description: 15% increased Fire Damage per stack of Ruby Venom
15% increased Poison Damage per stack of Ruby Venom

uniques.name: Omnis
uniques.loreText: All the stars in the empty sky flicker at once and fade into silence and shadow.

tooltipDescriptions.description: [6,18,1]% increased Attack and Cast Speed

If damage leaves you below 30% health and doesn't kill you, you are restored to full health, you gain ward equal to the health restored, all nearby enemies are slowed, and you gain haste for [3,6,3] seconds 
(20 second cooldown).

uniques.name: Siphon of Anguish
uniques.loreText: The sorrow of those that remain feeds the hungering void.

uniques.name: Stymied Fate
uniques.loreText: The end comes slowly, then quickly, then it is all that has ever been.

uniques.name: Apathy Maw
uniques.loreText: Forsake the darkening sky and let the ground swallow your mind.

uniques.name: Shattered Chains

tooltipDescriptions.description: Using a Potion Cleanses Stun and Freeze
Stun Immunity for 4 seconds when you use a Potion

uniques.loreText: As he was interred chains fell from the sky. As he was exhumed chains fell from the dead.

uniques.name: Marina Lost Soul

tooltipDescriptions.description: You are Damned when you cast a spell
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Damned is a stacking ailment that deals necrotic damage over time and reduces health regeneration by 20%

uniques.loreText: Countess Marina revived the cursed land of Urix in the name of the Emperor, unaware that some spirits are better left in the shadows.

uniques.name: Eye of Orexia
uniques.loreText: From beneath the dormant volcano, the titan's eye flickers and turns staring into rock and magma.

uniques.name: Leviathan Carver

tooltipDescriptions.description: You cannot avoid critical strikes

uniques.loreText: Forge Master Rupin'Ur sought to create a weapon capable of slaying any beast, but to most it more resembled a hunk of raw steel.

uniques.name: Lethal Concentration

tooltipDescriptions.description: Your Poison Damage Modifiers also apply at [150,210,2]% effectiveness to your Skeleton Rogues and your Falcon
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Your poison damage stats such as "increased poison damage"apply, but your poison ailment stats such as "chance to poison on hit"do not.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Minions leech 8% of Poison Damage as Health
tooltipDescriptions.altText: The health is restored to the minion that dealt the damage, not to you.

uniques.loreText: "Jade Dust- derived from fossils sold by traders claiming to come from beyond the eastern horizon. Evaluation- Extremely deadly."- Scalebane Master of Poison's Notes

uniques.name: Vilatria Storm Crown
uniques.loreText: Studying at the great colleges of Welryn and Vul'Kaur, Vilatria perfected the art of Storm Magic. Yet a scholarly life never sated her ambition and she returned to the Lake kingdoms of central Eterra. Without a god to lead them, their lords and elders were proud and open to challenges of force. With the college of Welryn on their doorsteps, they were not unprepared for arcane challengers, but their wards could not protect them from the lightning that tore threw the roofs of their halls and smote them in their thrones, and so Vilatria claimed their kingdoms by force.

uniques.name: Vilatria Downfall

tooltipDescriptions.description: Meteor is Converted to Lightning
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Converts meteor's base damage, causing it to no longer scale with fire damage and causing Meteor to count as a lightning spell. Does not affect Shrapnel.

uniques.loreText: In her old age, Vilatria's hubris only grew. Having defeated all her human challengers, the storm queen's mind turned to Lagon, the fabled god of the sea and storms. With her apprentice, she sailed out from the border town of Etendell, along the estuary and out into the Fogrise sea. Lagon was said to dwell beneath the far seas beyond the western isles, yet the journey was quick for Vilatria as she fuelled her sails with winds of magic. Eventually she alighted at night upon a great isle of rock, coral, and ancient shrines. The moon spoke to her from its reflection flickering on the surface of the sea. It spoke with the voice of Lagon, and it spoke with amusement at her challenge, readily accepting, and opening the heavens. Thousands of years have passed and Vilatria is long dead, and her kingdom fractured, but the storms still rage upon the seas around that isle.

uniques.name: Salt the Wound
uniques.loreText: A critical success, a critical failure... It's all in the coin toss.

uniques.name: Azurral Fury

tooltipDescriptions.description: Using a potion grants you Falsewater Fury until you run out of mana
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Does not grant Falsewater Fury if you are already out of mana

tooltipDescriptions.description: During Falsewater Fury your mana does not regenerate and is drained at an accelerating rate
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Mana drain starts at 0 and accelerates by 10 each second

tooltipDescriptions.description: During Falsewater Fury non-channelled melee attacks consume 20 mana to deal +100 melee fire damage

uniques.loreText: The nagasa of the Scorched Basin always warned merchants to disregard the false oasis on the long road to Keltha, but Azurral had never put much heed in the snake people's superstition and his thirst overcame him. He drew deep from the blood red waters. The next day he awoke to his caravan reduced to ash upon the sand and his sword burning hot in his hand.

uniques.name: Sanguine Hoard
uniques.loreText: "Our enemies have been hoarding their blood for far too long. Loose the arrows and let it return to Eterra."

uniques.name: Jasper Searing Pride

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy you gain a stack of Searing Blades for 16 seconds
Each stack of Searing Blades grants +2 melee fire damage and 20% melee ignite chance

uniques.loreText: A Warrior's Life burned to ashes and all that's left is pride.

uniques.name: Devotion
uniques.loreText: Where your limits end, your faith's test begins.

uniques.name: Fulgurite Shard

tooltipDescriptions.description: 60% of Shuriken and Lethal Mirage Base Damage converted to Lightning
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Adds a Lightning Tag. Conversion above 100% has no effect. At 100% conversion the Physical Tag is lost.

uniques.loreText: The best weapon smiths of the western isles disregard common metal. They need only the glass left in the wake of Lagon's fury.

uniques.name: Corsair Boarding Shield
uniques.loreText: Striking the Dreadnought would be their greatest feat yet, a win to remember that would silence those wishing to surrender to the Empire. However, for the captain freeing the whales was the true reward.

uniques.name: Corsair Blood Cowl
uniques.loreText: Standing up to the Empire, not giving in to temptation, the Corsairs of the Scoured Reefs are among the last standing men and women with running blood in their veins.

uniques.name: Scales of Eterra Fire Cold

tooltipDescriptions.description: Casting a cold spell grants Cold Infusion, with a 20 second cooldown
tooltipDescriptions.altText:
Cold Infusion gains a stack every second. Each stack grants 10% more cold damage and 6% less fire and lightning damage for 10 seconds.
Reaching 10 stacks of Cold Infusion applies Cold Overload for 10 seconds, granting 80% less cold damage and removing all Cold Infusion and Fire or Lightning Overloads

tooltipDescriptions.description: Casting a fire spell grants Fire Infusion, with a 20 second cooldown
tooltipDescriptions.altText:
Fire Infusion gains a stack every second. Each stack grants 10% more fire damage and 6% less cold and lightning damage for 10 seconds.
Reaching 10 stacks of Fire Infusion applies Fire Overload for 10 seconds, granting 80% less fire damage and removing all Fire Infusion and Cold or Lightning Overloads

uniques.loreText: The Scales of Eterra weighed the balance of the elements, ensuring that one would not eclipse the other. Balance is control, and whether that control breeds peace or destruction is up to those who hold the scales.

uniques.name: Scales of Eterra Cold Lightning

tooltipDescriptions.description: Casting a cold spell grants Cold Infusion, with a 20 second cooldown
tooltipDescriptions.altText:
Cold Infusion gains a stack every second. Each stack grants 10% more cold damage and 6% less fire and lightning damage for 10 seconds.
Reaching 10 stacks of Cold Infusion applies Cold Overload for 10 seconds, granting 80% less cold damage and removing all Cold Infusion and Fire or Lightning Overloads

tooltipDescriptions.description: Casting a lightning spell grants Lightning Infusion, with a 20 second cooldown
tooltipDescriptions.altText:
Lightning Infusion gains a stack every second. Each stack grants 10% more lightning damage and 6% less cold and fire damage for 10 seconds.
Reaching 10 stacks of Lightning Infusion applies Lightning Overload for 10 seconds, granting 80% less lightning damage and removing all Lightning Infusion and Cold or Fire Overloads

uniques.loreText: The Scales of Eterra weighed the balance of the elements, ensuring that one would not eclipse the other. Balance is control, and whether that control breeds peace or destruction is up to those who hold the scales.

uniques.name: Scales of Eterra Fire Lightning

tooltipDescriptions.description: Casting a fire spell grants Fire Infusion, with a 20 second cooldown
tooltipDescriptions.altText:
Fire Infusion gains a stack every second. Each stack grants 10% more fire damage and 6% less cold and lightning damage for 10 seconds.
Reaching 10 stacks of Fire Infusion applies Fire Overload for 10 seconds, granting 80% less fire damage and removing all Fire Infusion and Cold or Lightning Overloads

tooltipDescriptions.description: Casting a lightning spell grants Lightning Infusion, with a 20 second cooldown
tooltipDescriptions.altText:
Lightning Infusion gains a stack every second. Each stack grants 10% more lightning damage and 6% less cold and fire damage for 10 seconds.
Reaching 10 stacks of Lightning Infusion applies Lightning Overload for 10 seconds, granting 80% less lightning damage and removing all Lightning Infusion and Cold or Fire Overloads

uniques.loreText: The Scales of Eterra weighed the balance of the elements, ensuring that one would not eclipse the other. Balance is control, and whether that control breeds peace or destruction is up to those who hold the scales.

uniques.name: Bastion of Honour
uniques.loreText: Heed not the cowards that fight from the safety of range, or the generals that sit in their camps while their soldiers' blood spills. Face your foes with honour, a shield, and a good blade.

uniques.name: Rule of the Simoon
uniques.loreText: When fire falls in love with the wind, run.

uniques.name: Tongue of the Aberrant Seer
uniques.loreText: Litugy in darkness leads only to despair, poison on the tongue beguiles the soul, truth in unwords reveals salvation.

uniques.name: Battlemage Endeavour
uniques.loreText: In times of strife the inflexible are doomed to break. A true Battlemage must master all the arts of war.

uniques.name: Stormhide Paws

tooltipDescriptions.description: Every 3 seconds your next Swipe has 100% of its base damage converted to Lightning and deals +[30,45,3] Melee Lightning Damage

uniques.loreText: The roar of thunder above the frozen seas has long inspired stories among the nomads of great white bears that prowl the ice beneath the storms.

uniques.name: Darkstride
uniques.loreText: Decades after the rest of civilisation hid itself beneath the ground, the last of the void knights still roamed the ruined surface, searching relentlessly for a way to turn the power of the void against itself. Their discoveries remain with them, lost amidst the shadows.

uniques.name: Thorn Slinger
uniques.loreText: After making peace with the nagasa, Lord Berant of Skalnir was impatient to secure his legacy and so turned his eyes to an easier conquest. The Verdant Isle was small and his scouts assured him that its druid inhabitants had no weapons. But when his soldiers returned from the sacred island, they brought back only their thorn pierced fallen and tales of vine strangled ships.

uniques.name: Curse of Perseverance

tooltipDescriptions.description: Hungering Souls projectiles are fired in sequence and can all hit the same target but deal 63% less damage
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Multiplicative with other modifiers

uniques.loreText: The last imperial dwelt for centuries beneath Welryn, bound by his own sanctuary to witness the ruin of this world.

uniques.name: Lessons of the Metropolis
uniques.loreText: "Stay quick on your feet. Don't get hit once, but if you do get hit once, don't get hit twice"- Dar'Fuun, Scalebane Recruiter.

uniques.name: Kelthan Blasting Agent

tooltipDescriptions.description: 88% Reduced Decoy Duration

uniques.loreText: Overseer Nicovus had little patience for the traditional mining techniques of his living predecessors. The empire would delve deep and it would delve fast.

uniques.name: Ravenous Void

tooltipDescriptions.description: Gain a stack of Void Barrier every 5 seconds while above your endurance threshold
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Void Barrier stacks up to 3 times. You take 5% less damage per stack (multiplicative with other modifiers).

tooltipDescriptions.description: Dropping below your endurance threshold doubles all stacks of Void Barrier for 3 seconds, allowing you to exceed the normal maximum. After that all stacks of Void Barrier are converted to Mimic Feast.
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Time Rot deals void damage over time for 3 seconds and increases the duration of stuns you receive.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Each stack of Mimic Feast deals Void Damage over Time to you and disables Void Barrier generation and Health Leech
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Mimic Hunger is an Ailment that lasts 15 seconds and can be cleansed by effects that cleanse negative ailments.

uniques.loreText: A pair of mimic brothers, lost in the ravenous void, hungry for anyone who dips their hands inside.

uniques.name: Aberrant Call

tooltipDescriptions.description: Minions lose 6% of their current health per second

uniques.loreText: A beacon among the eternity of the damned. A call to return to the world of the living, if only for a moment.

uniques.name: Flayers Pride
uniques.loreText: The obscene angles at which the patches of undead skin are arranged belies the unsettling precision required to produce such a steady stream of blood. A treasured implement for any Hemomancer.

uniques.name: Throne of Ambition

tooltipDescriptions.description: You gain a stack of Ambition when you hit a boss or rare enemy (1 second cooldown)
tooltipDescriptions.altText: If you have multiple Thrones of Ambition equipped you still only gain 1 stack

tooltipDescriptions.description: 2% more Fire Damage per stack of Ambition
2% more Cold Damage per stack of Ambition
2% more Armour per stack of Ambition
tooltipDescriptions.altText: The effects of Ambition are multiplicative with other modifiers, but individual stacks are not multiplicative with each other.

tooltipDescriptions.description: You lose all stacks of Ambition if you go 4 seconds without gaining a stack
20 Maximum Stacks of Ambition
tooltipDescriptions.altText: If you have multiple Thrones of Ambition equipped your maximum stacks is still 20

uniques.loreText: Argentus may have been born a mere slave of Rahyeh, but his ambition eclipsed even his god.

uniques.name: Eternal Eclipse

tooltipDescriptions.description: Every 2 seconds your next Fire Melee Attack has +[200,240,2] Melee Void Damage and +[200,240,2]% Time Rot Chance
Every 2 seconds your next Void Melee Attack has +[200,240,3] Melee Fire Damage and +[200,240,3]% Ignite Chance

uniques.loreText: The triumph of man and osprix culminates upon the altar of Solarum. A frail sun rises behind an illuminable shadow, spreading a corona of half light upon the ruined world beneath. This feeble shadow is no salvation from the end, but only from the hope of what might have been.

uniques.name: Frostbite Shackles

tooltipDescriptions.description: +1% Ward Retention per 2% uncapped Cold Resistance

uniques.loreText: All the advances and discoveries of this great empire, yet even in death we remain frozen in place, shackled to this mortal plane.

uniques.name: Stormcarved Testament

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[36,44,2]% Lightning Resistance for You and Your Totems
+6 Spell Lightning Damage for you and your Totems
+12% Lightning Penetration for you and your Totems
+[60,94,1]% Shock Chance for you and your Totems
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Grants a chance to Shock on Hit

uniques.loreText: In ancient times it was believed that the will of Lagon could be gleaned from the patterns burned into the stones of the Scoured Reefs, and studied them at great length. Yet a wild storm needs no reason to strike where it does and the inscrutable stones were dismissed by later storm priests, who claimed it did not befit surface dwellers to decipher their god's purposes or designs.

uniques.name: Nightbringer
uniques.loreText: Most flee from the encroaching void and cower beneath the soil, but those with greater aspirations do not run from power, however terrifying it might be. Hunt the rifts and you will find what you seek.

uniques.name: Twisted Heart of Uhkeiros
uniques.loreText: In the blackened heart of an emperor, greed devours mercy.

tooltipDescriptions.description: +10 maximum Abyssal Rite stacks
When you directly cast an elemental spell each stack of Abyssal Rite is consumed to grant the spell +20 spell void damage and +20% void penetration per stack
Your critical strikes do not deal additional damage
tooltipDescriptions.altText: They deal the same damage as a regular hit

uniques.name: Yulia Path

tooltipDescriptions.description: when Maelstrom is cast from any source your minions gain +[2,4,5] melee necrotic damage for the maximum duration of the Maelstrom

uniques.loreText: Between loyalty and opression, hope and tyranny, the path of wisdom must be found.

uniques.name: Trinity of Flames

tooltipDescriptions.description: Every 3rd fire spell you cast is guaranteed to crit, but has 36% less critical strike multiplier (multiplicative with other modifiers)
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Not limited to direct casts but does not include sub skills

uniques.loreText: Three souls to nourish an unquenchable flame.

uniques.name: Deaths Embrace

tooltipDescriptions.description: Gain a stack of Harrowing Claim when you use Harvest and hit at least one enemy
tooltipDescriptions.altText: (Harrowing Claim lasts 1.5 seconds, stacks are refreshed when gained, max 2 stacks)

tooltipDescriptions.description: Using Harvest while at 2 stacks of Harrowing Claim instead consumes them to perform Grim Harvest, granting 200% more melee damage and 100% increased area of effect, but consumes mana and health

uniques.loreText: Everything comes with a price - even death.

uniques.name: Paranoia

tooltipDescriptions.description: [30,40,0]% Reduced Cooldown Recovery Speed for Lunge
Lunge Does Not Require a Target

uniques.loreText: In the whispering bull rushes and the swaying leaves, in the howling wind and flickering shadows, everywhere enemies hide.

uniques.name: Prismatic Gaze

tooltipDescriptions.description: Create a Prism Shard when you directly use an elemental skill that costs less than 40 mana
Release all Prism Shards when you directly use a skill that costs at least 40 mana
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Mana cost does not include mana consumption effects

tooltipDescriptions.description: Prism Shards orbit you for up to 10 seconds and then expire. If released, they target the nearest enemy and explode, dealing elemental damage and shredding elemental resistances.

uniques.loreText:
Time collapsing void
Observation... destruction
Bring her light with you

uniques.name: Chronostasis

tooltipDescriptions.description: Your melee skills consume up to [500,2000,0] ward, gaining +1 melee damage per 10 ward consumed
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Dual wielding this weapon will not provide this benefit twice, but it will raise the maximum ward you can consume for additional damage

uniques.loreText: It's the missing beat, the spurious tick of a broken clock, the jolt of sudden realization. As we swing this timeless artifact like frenzied apes, minds future and past laugh at our ignorance.

uniques.name: The Judicator

tooltipDescriptions.description: [20,26,4]% Increased Cooldown Recovery Speed for Judgement and Javelin
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Has no effect on Javelin unless it has been given a cooldown

uniques.loreText: It is Rahyeh's duty to pass judgement, and a Paladin's to deliver it.

uniques.name: Aurelis

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[20,28, 0] Lightning Damage with Spells and Melee Attacks

uniques.loreText: The sky's wrath alights in a golden storm.

uniques.name: Turanis Bident

tooltipDescriptions.description: 100% of Bleed and Ignite Chance converted to Electrify Chance for Javelin
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Electrify deals lightning damage over time, lasts 3 seconds, and has no stack limit.

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you use Javelin you gain a stack of Tu'rani's Thunder for 4 seconds. Each stack grants +[8,12,1] Spell Lightning Damage.
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Tu'rani's Thunder has no stack limit

uniques.loreText: Matron Tu'rani is still revered amongst the nagasa for leading the first successful campaign against the Osprix. Striking them out of the sky with javelins and thunderbolts, she drove them back into the Mountains of the Sun, liberating the town of Kel'tha.

uniques.name: Ferebors Chisel
uniques.loreText: When Ferebor's collection of totems grew too large, he gathered his creations in a cave while his fellow nomads moved on without him. As the winters passed and his collection grew, other nomads would visit him to trade food and furs for totems crafted to defend their tribes.

uniques.name: Ferebors Persistence
uniques.loreText: Fifty winters since they first parted, Ferebor's tribe returned to his cave eager to purchase another totem. However, instead of finding the storied totem carver, they were driven away by his creations. Assuming him dead, they paid their respects and moved on, yet the number of totems around the cave continued to grow. Some say Ferebor still dwells there, cut off from the outside but carving totem after totem among the shadows.

uniques.name: Roots of Vithrasil

tooltipDescriptions.description: You cannot move while in Spriggan Form

uniques.loreText: Root yourself into the cold earth and drink deep from Eterra's bounty.

uniques.name: Usurpers Mandate

tooltipDescriptions.description: Your minions cannot be Stunned

uniques.loreText: "Only one with the blood and bones of a king may rule. Fortunately, I have both"- Venred the Usurper

tooltipDescriptions.description: Puncture cannot be dodged
Puncture deals up to 40% more hit damage to distant enemies
tooltipDescriptions.altText: scales linearly from 0% right next to you up to 40% at 15 metres away

tooltipDescriptions.description: When a Companion is Downed it is automatically revived after 2 seconds (10 second cooldown)
When a companion is revived by Hakar's Phoenix it releases a burst of fire and gains 100 melee fire damage and 100% ignite chance for 20 seconds
tooltipDescriptions.altText: The burst of fire deals fire spell damage and scales with the minion's stats

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[12,20,1] Melee Fire Damage for you and your minions

uniques.name: Snowdrift

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[5,10,1] Cold Damage with Spells and Attacks

uniques.loreText: Let the northwind mold you, cold and howling above the frozen tundra.

uniques.name: Silvafrond

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you directly cast Summon Vines you are teleported to the target location
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This causes Summon Vines to count as a Traversal Skill. Using a Traversal skill puts all other traversal skills on cooldown and traversal skills' cooldowns do not recover while you are using a traversal skill.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Summoned Vines are immune to Poison

uniques.loreText: The life of the forest flows through every root and leaf

uniques.name: Droughts Release
uniques.loreText: "Our tribulations shall end with prosperity, and theirs with death"- Grand Alchemist Avello

uniques.name: Thornshell
uniques.loreText: Driven from their homes, the Meruna of Sur Soreth settled among the swamps and fens around Urix. Despite their unfamiliarity with the shallows and thickets of their new home, they gradually adapted to it, learning to tunnel through the mud and grow thorns from their shells.

uniques.name: Julras Stardial

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you use a movement or time travel skill all stats on this item are tripled for 4 seconds (12 second cooldown)

uniques.loreText: "By the movement of the stars, thirteen centuries have passed, are ruins all that remains?"

uniques.name: Somnia

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you kill a stunned enemy a different nearby enemy is stunned for 2 seconds (excludes bosses)
tooltipDescriptions.altText: The enemy must have been stunned before the killing blow. Unaffected by increased stun duration.

uniques.loreText: The very atmosphere is different here, what once slumbered is now awoken and free.

uniques.name: Julras Obsession

tooltipDescriptions.description: Stats on this item also apply to your minions
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Attributes on minions have no effect.

uniques.loreText: "This future must not come to pass. Surely there is some way, some power that can avert this horror?"

uniques.name: Vessel of Strife
uniques.loreText: The durance of strife is an impossible task. Boiling within, despair's sole fate is to erupt and envelop its vessel.

uniques.name: Shadow String
uniques.loreText: Unseen hands strike hardest

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[4,7,0]% Critical Strike Chance with Fire Skills
+[12,17,2] Fire Damage with Spells and Attacks
+[12,17,7]% increased Attack and Cast Speed with Fire Skills

uniques.name: Harthenons Vow
uniques.loreText: "My first loyalty is to those who follow me. I will not abandon them"- Harthenon, Last Druid of the Verdant Isle.

uniques.name: Singularity

tooltipDescriptions.description: You cannot deal Critical Strikes
tooltipDescriptions.altText: 100% less Critical Strike Chance (multiplicative with other modifiers)

uniques.loreText: "And thus from a singular point of infinite detail did the goddess Eterra weave the fabric of reality"- Book of Elders, Chapter 1.

uniques.name: Chronicle of the Damned
uniques.loreText: The souls of those whose deaths are inked within these pages are bound to the book itself, forever cursed to serve the reader.

uniques.name: FleshofStone

tooltipDescriptions.description: Cannot Leech Health
Your Health cannot exceed your Endurance Threshold

uniques.loreText: Anicent Titan blood once consumed, petrifies the flesh and hardens the blood.

uniques.name: Diothaens Bloody Nib

tooltipDescriptions.description: You are inflicted with bleed when you hit an enemy with Shatter Strike
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Hitting one enemy with both swings of Shatter Strike will result in two bleed stacks

uniques.loreText: "Some say the pen is mightier than the sword. Sacrificing your blood to write the words, now there’s real power."- Archmage Diothaen

uniques.name: Torkrefins Hunger

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you use a non-channelled Melee or Throwing Attack you expend a stack of Viscera to grant the attack +1% Physical Penetration with Bleed and +15% Bleed Chance per 5% uncapped Physical Resistance.
Every 2 seconds you gain a stack of Viscera
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Maximum 3 stacks

uniques.loreText: The nomads around lake Mawn were optimistic as Grand Matriarch Torkrefin rose to power among the nearby Wengari. She had at first seemed more civilised than the average Wengari, carrying a giant sword instead of a crude axe or club. Nevertheless she proved particularly difficult to reason with on account of her propensity to devour their envoys.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Triggering both effects within 2 seconds grants Haste for 2 seconds
When you use a Lightning Bow Attack your next Throwing Attack within 2 seconds has +[42,62,3]% Lightning Penetration
When you use a Lightning Throwing Attack your next Bow Attack within 2 seconds has +[42,62,3]% Lightning Penetration
[11, 26, 0]% increased Attack and Cast Speed
When a minion dies you have a [36,49,4]% Chance to cast Sacrifice on your lowest health minion (up to 2 times per second)
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Only counts your minions' deaths. Can be triggered by sacrificing a minion.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Gain 1 stack of Mountain's Endurance each second while not moving (up to 3)
tooltipDescriptions.altText: All stacks are lost when you move

tooltipDescriptions.description: -2 Mana Cost per stack of Mountain's Endurance
100% of Dodge Rating converted to Endurance Threshold while you have at least 1 stack of Mountain's Endurance

uniques.name: Face of the Mountain
uniques.loreText: The face of the mountain yields no emotion as waves, weather, and time crash upon it.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Gain Damage Immunity for 3 seconds after being Hit (15 second cooldown)
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This effect does not prevent damage from the hit that procs it

uniques.name: Peak of the Mountain

tooltipDescriptions.description: You cannot Leech Health from Critical Strikes

uniques.loreText: To achieve the loftiest of goals, victory must be valued over survival.

tooltipDescriptions.description: [13,19,0]% chance on hit to gain 2 Ward per Ignite and Damned on the Target and 30 Ward per Ignite and Damned on You (2 second cooldown)
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Additional sources of this stat add to the the chance to trigger, but not the ward gained.

uniques.name: Immolators Oblation
uniques.loreText: The pyromancers following the Fire Lich, Cremorus, perfected the technique of burning their own souls to fuel their dark magic.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Casting Transplant grants [460,694,5] Ward and converts every stack of Ignite on you to Damned with 160% Increased Duration
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This increased duration is additive with other sources of Increased Damned Duration. The remaining duration of each stack is also refreshed.

tooltipDescriptions.description: [23,13,1]% less Fire and Necrotic Damage Over Time Taken
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Multiplicative with other modifiers

tooltipDescriptions.description: Damned inflicted by Spells you cast while Damned has +[10,16,2]% Necrotic Penetration per stack of Damned on You
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This does not affect any other source of necrotic damage aside from Damned, and does not affect Damned on you.

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[20,26,3]% Fire and Necrotic Penetration
+[14,24,2] Spell Fire Damage for Damage Over Time Spells
Dread Shade is Converted to Cold
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This causes it to add and increase Cold Damage instead of Necrotic Damage. This takes priority over the Poison Conversion node on Dread Shade's tree.

uniques.name: Penumbra
uniques.loreText: Honour has no place in the arena. To defeat the mightiest foes, a champion must dance on the edge of shadows, preparing for the perfect moment to strike.

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you directly summon a Storm Totem all existing Totems gain [24,34,1] Spell Lightning Damage
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This buff stacks and does not expire. It does not apply to the totem whose summoning applied it.

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you use a Potion all your Totems are restored to full health and gain Damage Immunity for 2 seconds.
1% Increased Damage per 1% Increased Movement Speed
Every 3 Seconds your next Movement Skill deals [24,40,1]% more damage
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Multiplicative with other modifiers

uniques.name: Soul Gamblers Fallacy

tooltipDescriptions.description: Your Skills gain +100% Critical Strike Chance if you have not dealt a Critical Strike Recently. Excludes Channeled Skills.
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Recently refers to the last 4 seconds

uniques.loreText: When coins run out, you still have your soul to gamble.

uniques.name: Burning Avarice
uniques.loreText: Have the ambition to know what might be yours, and the conviction to burn those who would keep it from you.

tooltipDescriptions.description: 13% Increased Cast Speed with Physical and Fire Spells
21% Increased Critical Strike Chance with Physical and Fire Spells
34% Increased Stun Chance with Physical and Fire Spells
89% increased Physical and Fire Damage
Bees gain an additional [7,12,0] health and [7,12,1]% increased damage per point of your Attunement
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This is an addition to its normal Attunement scaling

tooltipDescriptions.description: Bleed inflicted by Bees has [4,6,2]% Physical Penetration per point of your Strength
When you directly cast Thorn Shield, the nearest Bee also gains Thorn Shield
Minions cannot deal Critical Strikes
Minions leech 4% of Physical Damage as Health
tooltipDescriptions.altText: The health is restored to the minion that dealt the damage, not to you

uniques.name: Scales of Lemniscate

tooltipDescriptions.description: Dread Shade has 30% increased Buff Effect and 25% increased Health Decay
You can only control one Shade
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This overrides other effects on your Shade limit

tooltipDescriptions.description: Casting Infernal Shade grants your minions Damage Immunity for 3 seconds (10 second cooldown)

uniques.loreText: A weapon wielded in service of the cycle. Surrender both hope and despair to serve eternity.

uniques.name: Hive Mind

tooltipDescriptions.description: Decoy releases [6,10,0] Bees when it explodes
When you hit a Bee with Acid Flask, it gains Toxic Coating
tooltipDescriptions.altText:
Toxic Coating grants 50% Chance to Poison on Hit and 10% less Damage Taken. Lasts 10 seconds and can stack.
If Acid Flask is converted to fire, it grants Chance to Ignite on Hit instead

uniques.loreText:
"Why is that decoy buzzing?"
"That's not a decoy, it's a beecoy!"

uniques.name: Gathering Fury

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you directly use a bow ability, you have a [8,12,0]% chance to repeat it (1 second cooldown)
When you directly use a bow ability and hit an enemy, gain 5% increased attack speed for 3 seconds, stacking up to 10 times

uniques.loreText: Lightning does strike twice

uniques.name: Golem Cage

tooltipDescriptions.description: Bone Golems have a 6% chance on hit to grant you [2, 4, 0]% of their missing health as ward (1 second global cooldown)
You cannot summon skeleton warriors, archers or rogues
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Other skeletal minions can still be summoned

tooltipDescriptions.description: Bone Shatter now has a 3 Second Cooldown

uniques.loreText: "Guilty as charged, I was being daft, but raising bones is my craft."- C.N.B

uniques.name: Lament of the Lost Refuge

tooltipDescriptions.description: 5% Increased Movement Speed and Mana Regen per stack of Corrupted Heraldry
+5 Spell Void Damage per stack of Corrupted Heraldry
All stacks of Corrupted Heraldry are lost when you use a Movement Skill
Volcanic Orb Converted to Void
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Volcanic Orb's base damage is converted to void and scales with increases to void damage instead of fire or cold. It cannot freeze even if previously converted to cold.

uniques.loreText: "I can hear them skitter, scratching at the walls. Their cries echo through these caverns like the wails of those lost outside. Just rats for now, but ‘they’ are lost no longer, they come back to us now, but different - corrupted."

uniques.name: Branch of Hallows

tooltipDescriptions.description: Gain 400 Ward when you Transform
Each stack of Maelstrom grants [3,4,2] Ward per second
+[150,220,3]% Ward Retention for 6 seconds when you Transform

uniques.loreText: Most druids talk to their woodland kin, rarely do the trees consider their fleshy brethren. Some branches seek a host to commune with, be it a man, beast, or treekin. Madness touches all in different ways.

uniques.name: Unstable Core

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you directly cast Elemental Nova 6 times without a 2 second gap, the 6th cast gains [200,350,3]% increased area and +[40,100,4] Spell Damage

uniques.loreText: Whether wrapped in shadows, barriers, blessings, or armor, the storm reduced them to ash.

uniques.name: Liaths Machinations
uniques.loreText: With careful planning and precise instruments, one can bring order even to a flame.

uniques.name: Red Ring of Atlaria

tooltipDescriptions.description: 10% less Damage Taken if you have at least 180 Total Attributes
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Multiplicative with other modifiers. Your Total Attributes is the sum of your Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence, Attunement, and Vitality.

uniques.loreText: One of seven enchanted rings that were all believed to be lost when Atlaria vanished beneath the waves.

uniques.name: Shadow Beacon
uniques.loreText: Once light fades, only darkness can guide those who remain.

uniques.name: Telfuns Mirage

tooltipDescriptions.description: 18% increased Movement Speed while not Channelling

uniques.loreText: Fascinated by mirages, Telf'un long wandered the deserts, telescope in hand. Even after decades of study and delirium he failed to truly comprehend their nature, but eventually the mirages took pity on the old man and turned him into one of their own.

tooltipDescriptions.description: You throw an axe at a nearby enemy every second while channelling Warpath

uniques.name: Firestarters Torch

tooltipDescriptions.description: [26,42,1]% More Fire Damage to enemies afflicted by Spreading Flames
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Multiplicative with other modifiers

uniques.loreText: "By Rahyeh's will this town shall burn!"

uniques.name: Rotmind

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[17,29,0] Poison Damage for Damage Over Time Spells

uniques.loreText: The witches of the Red Marsh learned to cultivate a type of magical fungus within their own skulls. The mycelium grew eagerly into their brains, twisting their minds, but the powers it bestowed were well worth their sanity.

uniques.name: The Ghost Maker

tooltipDescriptions.description: [36,61,1]% Increased Area for Infernal Shade and for your Summoned Wraiths' Melee Attacks
[11,16,2]% Chance to Cast Summon Wraith when you or one of your Wraiths kills an enemy
[22,36, 3]% Chance to Cast Infernal Shade when you or one of your Wraiths kills an enemy
+[61,66,5] Necrotic Damage for Damage Over Time Spells

uniques.loreText: A precise and expertly crafted tool for cutting a soul from a body

uniques.name: Jelkhors Blast Knife

tooltipDescriptions.description: Detonating Arrow no longer requires a bow

Detonating Arrow's initial projectile is changed to a melee attack that applies an explosive charge to each enemy it hits. Each charge explodes after the same duration that an arrow from Detonating Arrow would, and the explosion deals the same damage.
Detonating Arrow scales with melee damage instead of bow damage

uniques.loreText: Jelkhor was once the greatest archer and artificer in all of Majasa's domain. Eventually the diamond matrons grew fearful of his popularity among the human populace, and so they accused him of a terrible crime and had his left hand severed, so that he could no longer wield a bow. Though disgraced and outcast, Jelkhor's resolve remained and his ingenuity gave him the tools he needed to deliver his revenge.

uniques.name: Fragment of the Enigma

tooltipDescriptions.description: [65,125,1]% more Damage for Spark Charges applied by Melee Attacks
tooltipDescriptions.altText: multiplicative with other modifiers

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you cast Teleport you apply a Spark Charge to all enemies around the destination

uniques.loreText: When the scholars of Vul'Kaur realised the artifact's power, they shattered it immediately and told not even Majasa of their discovery.

uniques.name: Hand of Judgement
uniques.loreText: The light of divinity!

uniques.name: Harbinger of Stars
uniques.loreText: Above the skies the natural and the arcane are one.

uniques.name: Bos Anarchy
uniques.loreText: The streets of Maj'elka engender no love for authority

uniques.name: Apostates Sanctuary

tooltipDescriptions.description: Health Leech is disabled for 4 seconds when you directly cast a Spell

uniques.loreText: "The gods serve only themselves, foolish mortals. They will not protect you. If you wish to survive, you must forge your own sanctuary."

uniques.name: Pillagers Gold
uniques.loreText: The mercenary guilds of Skalnir care naught for the destruction they leave in their wake, as long as their pay is fair and they can take a cut of the spoils.

uniques.name: Apogee of Frozen Light

tooltipDescriptions.description: When a Minion dies you gain a stack of Frozen Vengeance
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Up to 8 stacks. Stacks last 8 seconds and gaining a new one refreshes their duration.

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you Hit an enemy with a melee attack you expend a stack of Frozen Vengeance to grant all your minions Frenzy and 24% more Damage to Chilled Enemies for 8 seconds and Freeze up to 8 nearby normal and magic enemies for 3 seconds
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This effect cannot trigger more than once per second and the buff does not stack. The freeze has a range limit of 8 metres.
