tooltipDescriptions.description: [24,38,3]% chance for Minions to Chill Attackers when Hit
+3 to Cold and Necrotic Minion Skills
Minions deal [14,24,2]% more Cold and Necrotic Damage to Chilled Enemies
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Multiplicative with other modifiers

uniques.loreText: Formosus knew not what cause these warriors had fought for, or what ancient conflict left their bodies frozen upon the outer ice. But, as he felt the rage and power of their lingering souls he knew well what purpose they would now fulfill.

uniques.name: Swaddling of the Erased

tooltipDescriptions.description: [6, 12, 1]% increased Attack and Cast Speed

uniques.loreText: "Cities, memories, whole timelines have been erased by the spreading void. There is much work ahead of us."- The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Font of the Erased

tooltipDescriptions.description: [4,10,0]% increased Health and Mana

uniques.loreText: "For those who have lost everything, The Weaver's bounty knows no end."- The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Cradle of the Erased

tooltipDescriptions.description: Gain a stack of Golden Aegis each second
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Up to 4 stacks

tooltipDescriptions.description: Lose a stack of Golden Aegis on Block

uniques.loreText: "Rest now, you are safe here in this cocoon. It's all gone now, but this is not where your thread ends."- The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Advent of the Erased

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you gain Haste or refresh its duration you gain [30,60,1] Ward (1 second cooldown) and your Minions gain Haste and Frenzy for 3 Seconds
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Frenzy is a buff that grants 20% Increased attack and cast speed. It cannot stack.

uniques.loreText: "Those long lost may walk again on woven feet"- The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Dedication of an Erased Primalist
uniques.loreText: "A protector of wilds long lost shall now serve a greater purpose"- The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Knowledge of an Erased Mage

tooltipDescriptions.description: Endurance applies to [5,9,0] additional Health per 10 Missing Mana
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This effectively raises your endurance threshold for calculating damage taken, but it does not count as endurance threshold for any other effects that depend on your endurance threshold.

uniques.loreText: "Such insight wasted on a lost timeline. It is for naught now, but it proves thy worth."- The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Code of an Erased Sentinel
uniques.loreText: "Memories of past honour that befits the woven form"- The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Ambitions of an Erased Acolyte

tooltipDescriptions.description: When a nearby enemy or ally dies you gain Ward equal to 2% to [4,6,1]% of its maximum health (2 second cooldown)

uniques.loreText: "The context of thy aspirations is long lost, yet they still pervade thy silken form."- The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Gambit of an Erased Rogue

tooltipDescriptions.description: 1 in 6 chance to take [25,15,1]% less Damage per Active Shadow
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Multiplicative with other modifiers. The number of shadows multiplies the damage reduction, not the chance.

uniques.loreText: "It is no accident that you have outlasted your world, but belief in one's own luck is a powerful tool."- The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Howl of the West Wind

tooltipDescriptions.description: Your Wolves cannot be Stunned
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Affects the Summon Wolf skill

uniques.loreText: Dark clouds roll in from the Sea of the Storms

uniques.name: Cycle of Putrescence

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[18,27,0] Poison Damage for your Minions' Damage Over Time Spells
Your Volatile Zombies have a chance to resurrect equal to 100% divided by your Number of Zombies
tooltipDescriptions.altText: For example if you have four zombies and one dies it has a 25% chance to resurrect. Resurrection occurs after 1 second.

uniques.loreText: "The cycle of life and death is forever shattered. Our cities shall not crumble and our citizens shall not yield or die at the whims of a winged devil. We shall persist. Our bodies may whither and decay, but even when we fall we return and persist again. Glory to the new cycle. Glory to persistence and decay. Glory to humanity."- Thelocus, Imperial Governor of Argentum

uniques.name: Static Shell
uniques.loreText: The carapace of a meruna storm ogre makes for an impressive trophy, and an effective cuirass.

uniques.name: Reowyns Fortress
uniques.loreText: "I have long travelled the north, Aergon. I have seen the great stone ruins at Reimhaven and Kolheim and I have seen the frozen blood of their ancient defenders. No tower can stand forever and those walls shall not avail you when the flames descends. You must strike first."- Reowyn's last letter to the mages of Oerden's Watch.

uniques.name: Blood of the Exile
uniques.loreText: Fleeing does not stem the flow

uniques.name: Crest of Unity

tooltipDescriptions.description: Elemental Nova is always Tri-Elemental
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Disables the possibility of it being Lightning Nova, Ice Nova, or Fire Nova, regardless of its tree.

uniques.loreText: In the waning years of his reign Lord Drelkor forbade the mages of Welryn from focusing their studies on any single element, lest their research lead them to aligning with forces beyond his domain.

uniques.name: Abacus Rod

tooltipDescriptions.description: Runebolt's element always matches the last skill you used directly that had a single elemental tag
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Elemental tags are Fire, Cold, and Lightning.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Runebolts that have a different element to the last Runebolt you cast grant you a stack of Numeromancy (up to 5) and refresh the duration of existing stacks
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Numeromancy stacks last 5 seconds

tooltipDescriptions.description: +5 Spell Damage per stack of Numeromancy
5% increased Cast Speed per stack of Numeromancy

uniques.loreText: "Runes provide order to magic, a way to shape it, harness it, and use it for one's will. Follow their structure and you shall remain in control, break it and you shall loose the madness between the lines."- Arch Runemaster Unvar to the college of Kolheim.

uniques.name: Elecoes Abandon

tooltipDescriptions.description: Throwing an Acid Flask consumes a Potion in order to throw an additional flask that deals [125,180,0]% more damage
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Can only trigger on direct throws and has no effect if you do not have a potion. Consuming a potion this way does not trigger the potion's health recovery, but does trigger other on potion use effects. The damage bonus is multiplicative with other modifiers.

uniques.loreText: "I do not need to mend the wounds that a dead foe had not the chance to inflict"- Elecoe the Alchemist Thief

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you cast Teleport or Transplant you are teleported to a random nearby location, become immune to all damage for 1 second, and gain Chronowarp for 10 seconds.
tooltipDescriptions.altText: The random teleportation range is 3 to 6 metres.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Chronowarp grants 35% increased cast speed and movement speed
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Chronowarp cannot stack

tooltipDescriptions.description: [5,10,1]% increased Cooldown Recovery Speed for Teleport and Transplant
When you cast teleport or transplant you time lock up to 10 enemies around the destination for 1 second. Bosses are slowed instead of time locked.
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Max range of 4 meters. Timelocked enemies cannot move or attack, as if they are stunned.

uniques.name: Transcribers Graver

tooltipDescriptions.description: Modifiers to Volcanic Orb speed also apply to Flame Rush speed and distance at [60,64,4]% effectiveness
Increases to Fire Aura Area also apply to Glyph of Dominion

uniques.loreText: Carve the burning nightmares into stone

uniques.name: Box of Hydrae
uniques.loreText: Deep within her research of Geometromancy, Runemaster Heraclea was surprised to discover a shape that behaved as if it had many heads.

uniques.name: Fundamental Criterion
uniques.loreText: Discard freely the paths not taken. They are only distractions from deeper knowledge.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Your Intelligence is equal to your Strength
Lightning Blast cast this way has +1% Critical Strike Chance per 5% uncapped Lightning Resistance and +1% Critical Strike Multiplier per 5% uncapped Cold Resistance

While standing on your Glyph of Dominion, 100% of your Ignite Chance is converted to Fire Resistance Shred Chance, 100% of your Chill Chance is converted to Cold Resistance Shred Chance, and 100% of your Shock Chance is converted to Lightning Resistance Shred Chance.
[39,52,0]% increased Duration of Ignite, Chill, Shock, Fire Resistance Shred, Cold Resistance Shred, and Lightning Resistance Shred.

uniques.name: Freys Retreat

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you directly cast Frost Wall it is cast directly in front of you and you leap backwards a short distance and invoke Revik's Blizzard at the wall.
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Frost Wall now counts as a movement skill. Revik's Blizzard is an Invocation normally cast via the Runic Invocation skill and it scales with Runic Invocation's tree. This consumes Revik's Blizzard's mana cost.

uniques.loreText: "The city is lost. All remaining garrisons are to head north. The great roots and ancient wards of Farwood shall be our last stronghold against the horde. And, Heorot Willing, it will be their tomb."- Arch Cryomancer Frey, Champion of Heorot.

tooltipDescriptions.description: After you directly cast a One Rune Invocation you gain Dawn to Dusk
tooltipDescriptions.altText: You cannot gain Dawn to Dusk while you have Dusk to Midnight

tooltipDescriptions.description: Directly casting a Two Rune Invocation consumes Dawn to Dusk to gain +48 Spell Damage and 24% increased area and grant you Dusk to Midnight
Directly casting a Three Rune Invocation consumes Dusk to Midnight to gain +96 Spell Damage and 48% increased area

uniques.name: Merophage

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you shatter a Two Handed Sword while you have Merophage equipped, it absorbs the shards you would gain, using them to gain Legendary affixes or replace its existing ones.
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Only legendary affixes are replaced. The unique affixes that started on the item always remain.

uniques.loreText: Forged by Archmage Drinial for his remaining son, it carries a powerful enchantment to draw out yearning. Now, its wielders unburdened, the sword itself yearns for its shattered kin.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Javelin no longer pierces, but when it hits an enemy it splits into 2 piercing spears that are fired at enemies around the target. 1 Additional spear is created per 12 Dexterity.
tooltipDescriptions.altText: The additional spears pierce. If there are no enemies near the target then only 2 spears are created, regardless of Dexteirty.

uniques.name: Mad Alchemists Ladle
uniques.loreText: Infused with countless potions, its effects are very unpredictable.

uniques.name: The Cuckoo

tooltipDescriptions.description: The Cuckoo may permanently change into a random exalted item when a nearby enemy dies
tooltipDescriptions.altText: It will still be an Avian Puppet. The exalted item always rolls as if it dropped in a level 100 area, but will have higher forging potential.

uniques.loreText: A puppet crafted to hold a transient spirit. It seems merely avian in nature, but it's impossible to shake the sense of unease that builds as one looks into those carved black eyes.

uniques.name: Wheel of Torment

tooltipDescriptions.description: You gain Haste for 3 seconds when you directly cast Soul Feast
When you directly cast Soul Feast you curse yourself and up to 1 nearby enemy per 10 Intelligence with Torment
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Can curse enemies within 20 metres but prefers enemies within 8 metres

uniques.loreText: The torment of consumed souls lingers within their devourer.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Once you have one Rune for Runic Invocation your runes cannot change until they are consumed
Once you have two Runes for Runic Invocation your runes cannot change until they are consumed
Once you have three Runes for Runic Invocation your runes cannot change until they are consumed

uniques.name: Communion of the Erased

tooltipDescriptions.description: Stats on this item are doubled for 1 second after using a Potion
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This buff does not stack and a potion use that applies the buff does not benefit from it unless you already had the buff

tooltipDescriptions.description: +1 Potion Slot per equipped Weaver's Will Item
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Weaver items are all uniques and legendaries that either have or had Weaver's Will

uniques.loreText: "Hark, disparate souls, for you have been blessed. Together you shall imbibe the venom of new life."- The Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Stygian Coal

tooltipDescriptions.description: Drain Life repeatedly casts Stygian Beams instead of its normal draining effect

uniques.loreText: The congealed loathing of souls trapped beneath the earth. Ample fuel for the destruction to come.

uniques.name: Sigeons Reprisal
uniques.loreText: "The best protection is the enemy's fear of retaliation"- General Sigeon

uniques.name: Spine of Malatros

tooltipDescriptions.description: Chthonic Fissures cast Flame Whip instead of releasing Spirits
Chthonic Fissure's Skill Tree applies to Flame Whip from all sources
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Nodes that affect the fissure and initial hit apply to flame whip, but nodes that only affect the spirits do not.

uniques.loreText: The withered dragon Malatros taught his followers the art of chthonic fire and sorcery. The rage of dragons would not die with him.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Poison Chance from all sources is converted to Frostbite Chance for Acid Flask

uniques.name: Blood Roost
uniques.loreText: The smell of blood fills the air.

tooltipDescriptions.description: While unarmed your Falcon's hits grant Cinder Strike +4 Melee Damage and 1% increasd Area for 6 seconds
+[12,27,5] Melee Fire Damage for you and your Minions
When you Critically Strike an enemy your Falcon gains +25 Melee Damage for 4 seconds and your Falcon Abilities recover 25% of their remaining cooldown (1 second cooldown)
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Falcon Abilities are Falcon Strikes, Dive Bomb, and Aerial Assault.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Casting Summon Wraith instead summons a Wraithlord
The Wraithlord scales with your Summon Wraith Tree and summons other Wraiths for you while in combat
tooltipDescriptions.altText: These Wraiths still count as yours, not the Wraithlord's, and scale with your Summon Wraith tree, not the Wraithlord's Summon Wraith tree.

tooltipDescriptions.description: While at max wraiths, the Wraithlord casts Necrotic Beams and regularly consumes your non-wraith minions to empower itself, gaining Temporary Maximum Health equal to 10% of their maximum health and +3 spell damage for 10 seconds
tooltipDescriptions.altText: The Wraithlord can consume up to 5 minions per cast. The buff from consuming minions can stack endlessly.

uniques.name: Naals Tooth

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[10,17,0] Melee Damage for you and your Minions
[5,10,2]% increased Movement Speed for you and your Minions
You can summon Raptors up to your Companion Limit

uniques.loreText: Among the island nomads there was once a legend of a great beastmaster, Gatan Larn, who was so in tune with the paravian kind that he could commune with crows and raptors.

tooltipDescriptions.description: You gain Haste and [12,30,2]% increased Throwing Attack Speed for 2 seconds after using Aerial Assault
Aerial Assault's Burst of Feathers includes 1 Umbral Blade per 20 Dexterity
tooltipDescriptions.altText: These Umbral Blades behave the same way as those thrown by the Twighlight Strike node on the Aerial Assault tree and cannot target the same enemies as those Umbral Blades or each other

uniques.name: Sword Catcher

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[28,39,1] Melee Damage for you and your Minions

uniques.loreText: "The wild cannot be protected by unnatural things, by stone walls or iron shields. The flame and steel that would destroy it must be stopped in their tracks and broken by the primal rage of its defenders."- Nomad Chief Thulr

uniques.name: Black Blade of Chaos

tooltipDescriptions.description: Lethal Mirage no longer grants invulnerability but is a much quicker attack

uniques.loreText: Forged with shadow iron on an unlit moon to claim Lagon's power over elemental chaos.

uniques.name: Orians Sun Seal

tooltipDescriptions.description: Symbols of Hope is automatically activated when damage taken leaves you below your endurance threshold, consuming [70,80,2]% of its cooldown and mana cost.
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This effect can only occur if Symbols of Hope is on your ability bar and not on cooldown, and you have positive mana.

uniques.loreText: "Piety need not stay your wings nor slow the winds of conquest."- Grand Haruspex Uranos

tooltipDescriptions.description: Minions are automatically Sacrificed after 2 seconds. If you have any mana then [53,89,0]% of Sacrifice's mana cost is consumed. Otherwise this cast of Sacrifice deals 80% less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers)
Your minions cannot be Stunned

uniques.name: Egg of the Forgotten

tooltipDescriptions.description: Can be replaced with a Unique Item that lacks both Legendary Potential and Weaver's Will
Changes into a random Unique Item if challenged or empowered

uniques.loreText: The lost scion of light dwells no longer among the sun, nor in the resplendent mountains of the east. It lingers only in the minds of the servants of fire, guiding the hands that carve and chisel.

uniques.name: Harbingers Needle

tooltipDescriptions.description: Breaks if equipped when you kill a timeline boss above 90 corruption, causing that timeline boss kill to grant 3 additional Gaze of Orobyss.
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Only one Harbinger's Needle can be consumed at once.

uniques.loreText: A needle forged by Aberroth in the heart of a black hole. It is designed to be plunged into a powerful foe, to sacrifice them to the dark god of fate.

uniques.name: Bane of Winter
uniques.loreText: Time thaws all winters

uniques.name: The Inevitable

tooltipDescriptions.description: You cannot be Stunned while using Erasing Strike

uniques.loreText: All timelines fade and the Harbingers flock like crows to the remains.

uniques.name: Phantom Grip

tooltipDescriptions.description: The Stats on your Gloves apply to your Forged Weapons at [64,100,4]% effectiveness

uniques.loreText: The one armed smith, Draelyn, perfected the art of controlling her animated weapons as if she were holding them with her own hand. Though lauded throughout the forges of Solarum, she was secretive about her methods, and this lead to rumours that she invoked necromancy in her craft, and some even swore they had glimpsed spectral fingers gripping her weapons as she fought.

uniques.name: Yruns Penance
uniques.loreText: Like Yrun himself, the former champion's blade was imprisoned in bark and ice.

uniques.name: Flight of Quetzeri
uniques.loreText: As the exiled druids flourished in the cloud forests, they learned to seemlessly flit between the forms of human and quetzal.

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you use Evade you cast Static Orb for 90% of its mana cost
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Static Orb is cast in the direction of travel and detonates at the destination. No effect if you are out of mana.

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you use Evade you transfer all stacks of Shock on you to nearby enemies
tooltipDescriptions.altText: The duration of shock applied to the enemies is the full duration of shock you normally apply

uniques.name: Plague Dragons Tongue
uniques.loreText: In the early days of Welryn, the archmage Sinveri led the assault to slay the plague dragon, Quolahron, last scion of Uhkeiros, and save the town's fields from blight. The dragon fell, yet, like many mages of Welryn, Sinveri did not lack ambition, and took Quolahron's crystal tongue, to research and wield its dark power.

uniques.name: Nihilis
uniques.loreText: From every void, every lost moment, the will of Orobyss echoes for eternity.

uniques.name: Wall of Nothing
uniques.loreText: Cloaked in the void, Harbingers need fear naught.

uniques.name: Aberroths Command

tooltipDescriptions.description: Void Cleave is now instant and is no longer a movement skill
Void Cleave no longer has a weapon requirement
Ravaging Auras created by Void Cleave lasts an additional [6,12,3] seconds and have +40% Void Penetration

uniques.loreText: "Be the instrument of ruin, that which delivers time's atrophy, and fate's damnation."

tooltipDescriptions.description: Enemies put a lower priority on targeting you compared to your minions and other allies

uniques.name: Seed of Ekkidrasil
uniques.loreText: From the minds of the devoted grows the roots of the tree of nothing

uniques.name: Null Portent

tooltipDescriptions.description: 1% less Damage Taken per 2% Resistance above the normal resistance cap (up to 20% less Damage Taken)
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Multiplicative with other modifiers. For example having 85% fire resistance will cause you to take 5% less fire damage, because it's 10% above the normal 75% cap.

uniques.loreText: Gorge on the prophecies of futures lost

uniques.name: Fingers of the Phantom Mire

tooltipDescriptions.description: Evade is replaced by Terrify
You have Swiftness
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Swiftness grants increased movement speed based on character level

tooltipDescriptions.description: You are Immune to Slow
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This grants you immunity to the Slow ailment, not to other sources of speed reduction such as chill.

uniques.loreText: A drained bog seeks vengeance

tooltipDescriptions.description: Evade is replaced by Summon Crab
You have Swiftness
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Swiftness grants increased movement speed based on character level

tooltipDescriptions.description: You cannot Gain Ward while in Combat

uniques.name: Monument of Protection
uniques.loreText: A shield dedicated to the great warrior, Arek, who gave his life to repel death from the city's walls.

uniques.name: Event Horizon

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you use a Melee Attack and hit at least one enemy you gain a stack of Dilation (up to 10)
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Dilation has no time limit and no effects beyond those described on this item

tooltipDescriptions.description: 15% more Melee Damage per stack of Dilation
tooltipDescriptions.altText: multiplicative with other modifiers

tooltipDescriptions.description: 5% less Attack and Cast Speed per stack of Dilation
tooltipDescriptions.altText: multiplicative with other modifiers

tooltipDescriptions.description: 5% less Movement Speed per stack of Dilation
tooltipDescriptions.altText: multiplicative with other modifiers

tooltipDescriptions.description: All stacks of Dilation are lost when you use Evade
[50,72,0]% Penetration against All Resistances with Melee Damage

uniques.loreText: All must pass beyond the brink

uniques.name: World Splitter
uniques.loreText: Sever the chains that bind reality

tooltipDescriptions.description: Evade is replaced by Spirit Step
You have Swiftness
When you directly use a Fire, Necrotic, or Void skill you create a Wandering Spirit near the target location (4 second cooldown for each skill type).
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Each skill type has a separate cooldown. The spirit is created at an accessible location, where it can be swapped with.

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[10,17,0]% Fire, Necrotic, and Void Penetration
You cast Doom Pulse when you directly cast a Fire, Cold, Lightning, Necrotic, or Void Spell (4 second cooldown for each spell type).
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Each spell type has a separate cooldown

tooltipDescriptions.description: While channelling Focus you move towards your current target location at 80% of your normal movement speed
tooltipDescriptions.altText: You can change direction during Focus and the speed of movement scales with your movement speed

tooltipDescriptions.description: While channelling Focus you cast Lightning Blast once per second
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Each cast consumes 100% of Lightning Blast's mana cost and only occurs if you have more than 0 mana

tooltipDescriptions.description: Mana regeneration from Focus is half as effective
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This affects all mana regeneration granted by Focus, but not other sources of mana regeneration

tooltipDescriptions.description: You have 50% less armor while channeling Focus

uniques.name: Tolmats Incorrect History of Eterra

tooltipDescriptions.description: You summon a Historic Minion from a random era of Eterra

uniques.loreText: Written by an esteemed historian, this book chronicles the entire history of Eterra as we understand it. Or, at least, as Sir Tolmat understood it.

uniques.name: Mantle of the Pale Ox

tooltipDescriptions.description: [20,32,0]% increased Health for you and your Minions

uniques.loreText: Fight with the strength of an ox and the wisdom of a spirit

uniques.name: Phalanx
uniques.loreText: It was not just Liath's magic and machinery that drove the Wengari threat from Thetima's walls, but the discipline and order her generals instilled in her human soldiers.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Heartseeker now counts as a Throwing Skill and scales with Throwing Damage instead of Bow Damage
You are limited to one active Heartseeker
If you have no active Heartseeker and are in combat you throw one at a nearby enemy (3 second cooldown)

uniques.name: Pearls of the Swine Blood

tooltipDescriptions.description: Bone Curse also inflicts Decrepify
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Decrepify is a Curse which deals 200 physical damage over 10 seconds with added damage applying at 100% effectiveness per second, and gains 1% more damage per 5 of your missing health. It also causes the target to take 15% more damage from damage over time.

uniques.loreText: Perrin the swineherd preferred not to ask questions. He didn't ask where the feed he was paid to accept came from, or why it glowed at night. He didn't ask why his swine began to whisper the names of dead men when they thought he wasn't looking.

uniques.name: Pearls of the Swine Fire

tooltipDescriptions.description: Bone Curse also inflicts Penance
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Penance is a Curse that lasts 15 seconds which causes affected targets to take 20 spell fire damage when they hit another target, but it does not stack.

uniques.loreText: Perrin the swineherd preferred not to ask questions. He didn't ask where the feed he was paid to accept came from, or why it glowed at night. He didn't ask why his swine began to whisper the names of dead men when they thought he wasn't looking.

uniques.name: Pearls of the Swine Poison

tooltipDescriptions.description: Bone Curse also inflicts Acid Skin
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Acid Skin is a Curse which deals 80 poison damage over 5 seconds with added damage applying at 80% effectiveness per second, and adds a 20% chance to be critically hit.

uniques.loreText: Perrin the swineherd preferred not to ask questions. He didn't ask where the feed he was paid to accept came from, or why it glowed at night. He didn't ask why his swine began to whisper the names of dead men when they thought he wasn't looking.

uniques.name: Gordian Prism

tooltipDescriptions.description: Directly cast Three Rune Invocations always cast Grand Prism Nova instead
Grand Prism Nova's base damage is converted based on the Runes used to invoke it
tooltipDescriptions.altText: For example if it is invoked with two Rah runes and one Heo rune, two thirds of the base damage will be fire, and one third will be cold

tooltipDescriptions.description: Grand Prism Nova gains [50,65,2]% chance to ignite, shock, or chill per Rune
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Each Rah rune grants ignite chance, each Gon rune grants shock chance, and each Heo rune grants chill chance

uniques.loreText: "What is innovation without the power to prove its worth? If you present me a solution that is outperformed by a raw expression of power then you have brought me nothing!"-Runemaster Gordian

uniques.name: Crystalwind

tooltipDescriptions.description: Gain 4 stacks of Crystalwind per second while moving and 4 stacks when you Evade (max 8)
Directly using a bow attack consumes up to 4 stacks of Crystalwind to deal [8,15,2]% more damage per stack

uniques.loreText: The wind chimes sing within the mines

tooltipDescriptions.description: Contains a random unique one-handed sword
Contains a random unique one-handed axe
Contains a random unique one-handed mace
Contains a random unique two-handed sword
Contains a random unique two-handed axe
Contains a random unique two-handed mace
Contains a random unique two-handed spear
Contains a random unique two-handed staff
Contains a random unique body armor
Contains a random unique dagger
Contains a random unique sceptre
Contains a random unique wand
Contains a random unique bow
Contains a random unique quiver
Contains a random unique shield
Contains a random unique catalyst
Contains a random unique relic
Contains a random unique ring
Contains a random unique amulet
Contains a pair of random unique gloves
Contains a random unique belt
Contains a pair of random unique boots
Contains a random unique helmet

uniques.name: Elecoes Innovation

tooltipDescriptions.description: Your critical strike chance also applies to your potion uses. When a potion use crits, the health and ward you immediately gain from it is multiplied by a percentage of your critical strike multiplier.
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This does not increase the effect of temporary stats granted on potion use

uniques.loreText: Elecoe discovered that with the right ingredients potions could be imbued with the luck of the brewer.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Spirit Thorns has 3% less cast speed per Vale Spirit
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Multiplicative with other modifiers and with each other stack of this effect

tooltipDescriptions.description: Gain a Vale Spirit every second while in Spriggan Form
tooltipDescriptions.altText: When you cast Spirit Thorns, an additional thorn will be released from each Vale Spirit orbiting you. All Spirit Thorns are cast by you, not by the Vale Spirits.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Using a potion restores Volatile Reversal's cooldown
With at least 50 Intelligence Volatile Reversal deals 20% more void damage
With less than 50 Intelligence Volatile Reversal is converted to fire

uniques.name: Orb Weavers Fang

tooltipDescriptions.description: Stats on this item are doubled for 3 seconds after hitting a boss or rare enemy that is at low health
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Low health is 35% or less

uniques.loreText: "You are the blade that will cut the imperfections from the Weaver's web."- Masque, the Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Nest of Nightmares

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[2,6,0]% of Damage Leeched as Health on Melee Hit for you and your Minions
+[25,45,1]% Melee Critical Strike Multiplier for you and your Minions

uniques.loreText: "I was surrounded by golden silk, curious creatures, and Her words filling my very soul."- Masque, the Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Essence Weaver

tooltipDescriptions.description: Stats on this item are tripled for casts which consumed Elemental Essence
Gain a stack of Elemental Essence when you directly use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy (up to 9 times per 3 seconds)
At 9 stacks of Elemental Essence, consume all stacks to randomly cast Smite, Frost Claw, or Storm Bolt at a nearby enemy per essence consumed
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This consumes mana equal to the chosen spell's mana cost

uniques.loreText: "Imagine a world free of pain, chaos, and sorrow. A world free of corruption. A perfect world!"- Masque, the Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Weavers Gift

tooltipDescriptions.description: +[30,60,0]% chance to Electrify and Slow on hit
[1,3,1]% of Damage Leeched as Health from Damage Over Time
+[22,33,2]% Penetration against All Resistances for Damage Over Time

uniques.loreText: "The Weaver is the greatest artist of all, to grace Her domain is a blessing."- Masque, the Acolyte of Golden Silk

uniques.name: Inheritance of the Erased

tooltipDescriptions.description: Every 10 seconds a random minion is Chosen, receiving Frenzy and 200% of the stats on this item
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Chosen is a buff which lasts for 10 seconds. Frenzy grants 20% increased attack and cast speed.

uniques.loreText: "Our tears for them will be dew upon perfect golden silk."- Masque, the Acolyte of Golden Silk

tooltipDescriptions.description: Wandering Spirits is centered on a Gravestone at the targeted location instead of you
The Gravestone grants allies within 12 meters [10,15,0]% more necrotic damage over time against cursed enemies
tooltipDescriptions.altText: If Wandering Spirits is converted to another element, this buff is also converted. Multiple sources of this buff do not stack.

tooltipDescriptions.description: Each second every enemy looking at you has up to a 20% chance to be Petrified for 2 seconds
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This chance is 80% lower for rare enemies, and 96% lower for bosses. Petrify is a stun, preventing all movement and action.

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you block an enemy's hit it has up to a 20% chance to be Petrified for 2 seconds
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This chance is 80% lower for rare enemies, and 96% lower for bosses

tooltipDescriptions.description: Evade casts Glacier along its path
tooltipDescriptions.altText: This consumes mana equivalent to Glacier's mana cost

uniques.name: Shattered Worlds

tooltipDescriptions.description: You are immune to Slow
You have Haste
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Effects which trigger when gaining or refreshing Haste will occur every second

uniques.loreText: The unrestrained power of countless shattered timelines, condensed into a vortex of possibility

uniques.name: Downfall of the Righteous

tooltipDescriptions.description: Witchfire deals More Damage equal to 66% of your increased Curse Damage
While you have both Ignite Overload and Damned Overload, enemies within 10 meters are inflicted with Witchfire every second
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Witchfire is an ailment that deals 600 fire and 600 necrotic damage over 12 seconds. It cannot stack.

uniques.loreText: They told me not to do it, now I know why

tooltipDescriptions.description: While you have more than 10% of your maximum health as delayed damage, damage to health below your endurance threshold is reduced by 30%
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Delayed damage refers to hit damage which is being dealt over 4 seconds

uniques.name: Brewmasters Buckle
uniques.loreText:
They say beer makes you bold
I say it makes you unbreakable

tooltipDescriptions.description: 20% increased range with Firebrand and Puncture
Block Chance is converted to Parry Chance while not wielding a shield
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Maximum Parry Chance is 75%

tooltipDescriptions.description: Gain a stack of Kismet when you directly use a melee attack and hit at least one enemy
tooltipDescriptions.altText: Max 8 stacks. Dual wielding this weapon affects the amount of stacks gained.

tooltipDescriptions.description: When you use a throwing attack, consume all stacks of Kismet to gain +8% throwing critical strike chance and +8 throwing physical damage per stack
